entry.title: Building a multi-room chat application with Laravel and Centrifugo
entry.id: Building a multi-room chat application with Laravel and Centrifugo
entry.summary: In this tutorial, we are integrating Laravel framework with Centrifugo real-time messaging server to make a multi-room chat application.

entry.title: Centrifugo integration with Django – building a basic chat application
entry.id: Centrifugo integration with Django – building a basic chat application
entry.summary: In this tutorial, we are integrating Django with Centrifugo to make a basic chat application. We are using Centrifugo proxy feature to proxy WebSocket connection events to a Django backend.

entry.title: Centrifugo integration with NodeJS tutorial
entry.summary: In this tutorial we are integrating Centrifugo with NodeJS. We are using Centrifugo connect proxy feature to authenticate connections over standard Express.js session middleware.

entry.title: Centrifugo v3 released
entry.summary: Centrifugo v3 released with lots of exciting improvements
